Decapitation Strike  —  Each of Trump's proposed appointments is a surprise.  It is comforting to think that he is simply a vengeful old man, lashing out this way and that.  This is unlikely.  He and Musk and Putin have been talking for years.  And the whole idea of his campaign was that this time he had a plan.

It's Time for Outgoing Democrats to Play Hardball  —  IN THIS CRUCIAL PERIOD between the election and the inauguration, opponents of the president-elect need to use every feasible lever of power to defeat Trump's movement, lest the country fail.  —  In this, they would be correcting a past mistake.
